PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-09142019-06-22,  ,  ,  INTD,  GAC,  FIN, 
ActInternational Financial Assistance Act
SubjectInternational Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisINTERNATIONAL FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to (1) support the deployment of the International Assistance Innovation Program and the Sovereign Loans Program, as well as the Government's climate repayable contributions programming; (2) establish the parameters for innovative financing within the context of the above-mentioned programs that will address development challenges in developing countries, and support international assistance; and (3) safeguard the Consolidated Revenue Fund.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0249 Publication Date: 2019-07-10
